name: @algwiki/monorepo
description: Website for programming algorithms and puzzles.
author: jakzo

scripts.lint:fix: project && eslint --cache --ext js,jsx,ts,tsx ./ --fix && prettier -c "./**/*{.json,.md}" --write && run-if-script-exists lint:fix:custom
scripts.lint: project && eslint --cache --ext js,jsx,ts,tsx ./ && prettier -c "./**/*{.json,.md}" && run-if-script-exists lint:custom
scripts.build: project && run-if-script-exists build:custom-before && tsc -b ./tsconfig.build.json && run-if-script-exists build:custom
scripts.test:all: project && tsc -p ./tsconfig.json --noEmit && tsc -b ./tsconfig.build.json && eslint --cache --ext js,jsx,ts,tsx ./ && prettier -c "./**/*{.json,.md}" && run-if-script-exists lint:custom && jest --passWithNoTests && run-if-script-exists test:custom
scripts.release: project && rimraf "./dist" "*.tsbuildinfo" && run-if-script-exists build:clean:custom && run-if-script-exists build:custom-before && tsc -b ./tsconfig.build.json && run-if-script-exists build:custom && yarn workspaces foreach --verbose --topological --no-private npm publish --tolerate-republish && run-if-script-exists release:custom
